tasks.title: Setup Embedding Generation for Text
tasks.description: Integrate text embedding generation for clipboard text data using OpenAI's text-embedding-3-small model.
tasks.details: Trigger embedding generation upon saving new text to clipboard history. Call OpenAI API to generate embeddings.
tasks.testStrategy: Mock API calls, confirm embeddings are generated and saved properly.

tasks.title: Setup Embedding Generation for Images
tasks.description: Integrate image description and embedding generation using OpenAI's models for clipboard images.
tasks.details: Generate image descriptions using OpenAIâ€™s gpt-4-vision-preview and convert descriptions to embeddings.
tasks.testStrategy: Mock API calls, validate descriptions and embeddings generation.

tasks.title: Database Schema Update for Embeddings
tasks.description: Add a new table to store embeddings in SQLite and ensure relational integrity with clipboard history.
tasks.details: Create clipboard_embeddings table with proper schema and foreign key constraints.

tasks.title: Implement Semantic Search Logic
tasks.description: Develop back-end logic for semantic search using embeddings in clipboard history.
tasks.details: Compute cosine similarity between query and stored embeddings, sort results by relevance.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for cosine similarity computations, integration tests for search results.

tasks.title: Add UI Controls for Semantic Search
tasks.description: Develop UI components to enable semantic search feature and toggle in search interface.
tasks.details: Create a toggle button for enabling semantic search. Update UI to handle both regular and semantic search input.
tasks.testStrategy: UI tests to verify toggle functionality and search interactions.

tasks.title: Integrate Search Logic with UI
tasks.description: Connect UI search controls with semantic search backend implementation.
tasks.details: Listen for toggle activation, execute semantic search upon user request.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end tests from UI to search results validation.

tasks.title: Error Handling and Retry Mechanism
tasks.description: Implement robust error handling for API failures and add retry logic.
tasks.details: Gracefully handle exceptions during API calls. Implement retry mechanism for network-related issues.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate network failures, ensure retry mechanism works as expected.

tasks.title: Ensure Data Consistency in Database
tasks.description: Maintain data consistency when clipboard history records are deleted.
tasks.details: Implement cascading deletes to remove unused embeddings when clipboard history is pruned.
tasks.testStrategy: Data integrity tests to ensure foreign keys are upheld and unnecessary data is removed.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance for Large Data Sets
tasks.description: Ensure system can handle large volumes of clipboard history and embeddings.
tasks.details: Optimize database queries and similarity calculations for performance.
tasks.testStrategy: Load testing with large data sets to measure and improve performance.

tasks.title: User Documentation and Training
tasks.description: Create comprehensive user guides and training materials for the new semantic search feature.
tasks.details: Develop documentation and training modules to help users understand and utilize the semantic search feature effectively.
tasks.testStrategy: Usability testing of documentation and training materials with a sample user group.
